returns._0: string the name of the scope

mint(address,bytes).details: Mints a single token to a specified address.

params.data: Additional data to be passed to the minting process.
params.to: The address to which the token will be minted.

returns.tokenId: The ID of the minted token.

mintBatch(address,bytes,uint256).details: Mints multiple tokens to a specified address.

params.data: Additional data to be passed to the minting process.
params.quantity: The number of tokens to mint.
params.to: The address to which the tokens will be minted.

returns.tokenIds: An array of the IDs of the minted tokens.

getScopeName().notice: Get the scope this NFT claims to belong to

mintBatch(address,bytes,uint256).notice: Mint a batch of new tokens
